story_final_01_10000/2401_1201_0100_10:
Amazing! Giovanni’s sync stone was even brighter
than that kid’s! He’s tamed Hoopa!
story_final_01_10000/2401_1201_0300_10: Hmph. I guess even Paulo could only get this far.
story_final_01_10000/2401_1201_0400_10:
Giovanni, sir! We, the newly reborn Team Break,
would like to join your ranks!
story_final_01_10000/2401_1201_0700_10: Oh please. What nonsense are you spouting now?
story_final_01_10000/2401_1201_0800_10:
What worth do you have, now that you’ve lost
control of Hoopa’s power?
story_final_01_10000/2401_1201_0900_10: There’s no reason for us to follow you anymore!
story_final_01_10000/2401_1201_1200_10:
Don’t tell me that, even now, you still cling to the
idea of “connections” with other people and
Pokémon?
story_final_01_10000/2401_1201_1400_10:
You’re the one who rejected friendship and other
such naive notions of the heart...
story_final_01_10000/2401_1201_1500_10: It was a smart, adult decision.
story_final_01_10000/2401_1201_1600_10:
However, the strength you gained was far
too little.
story_final_01_10000/2401_1201_1700_10:
And in the end, everything falls in line with
whatever is bigger or stronger.
story_final_01_10000/2401_1201_1800_10:
After all, the adult world is a heartless one—one
of “costs” and “benefits.” To us, it’s just business.
story_final_01_10000/2401_1201_2100_10:
No matter how much you resent me, you should
have cooperated.
story_final_01_10000/2401_1201_2200_10:
If you had, you might’ve noticed the gap between
your strength and mine—and the chance your
Hoopa would be stolen.
story_final_01_10000/2401_1201_2300_10:
You could’ve even pretended to cooperate at first,
before launching a surprise attack.
story_final_01_10000/2401_1201_2500_10: You’re still wet behind the ears.
